story_pages: Your name is Grant Scholar. This is the last month of your studies. You're finally about to earn that long-awaited master's degree!
However, you're facing a life-or-death emergency: you only have $1,500 left in your pocket!
Find a way to make the most of the last bit of money and struggle through this month!

12.description: Today is the graduation dinner organized by the department. Everyone is happy!
